answers.answer: Hi,Burning sensation in the feet could be due to diabetes or nerve problem. Please check your sugar levels and consult a physician.If this doesn't suffice you can go for a nerve conduction study and consult a neurologist.Hope this helps you. Take care and regards!

question: I am 27 year old male, i have a feet burning sensation, my left leg,,,feet has a burning sensation, its like walking on a fire,, This burning sensation is only in the left leg feet, and its prolonging from 10 months.. i dont know what to do, i have not consulted any doctor, please advice
title: leg burning sensation
